data.name: Events_MODULE_NOT_SUPPORTED

data.name: Events_REQUEST_DENIED_NO_TEMPLATE_INFO

data.name: ReqVal_Err_Parse_Request
data.value: Unable to parse the given certificate request. Request type was {0}.

data.name: ReqVal_Key_Pair_Mismatch
data.value: The certificate request does not use a {0} key pair, which is required by policy.

data.name: ReqVal_Key_Too_Small
data.value: Key length of {0} Bits is less than the required minimum length of {1} Bits.

data.name: ReqVal_Key_Too_Large
data.value: Key length of {0} Bits is more than the allowed maximum length of {1} Bits.

data.value: Unable to parse the given subject distinguished name.

data.name: ReqVal_Unsupported_San_Type
data.value: The certificate request contains an unsupported Subject Alternative Name type with OID {0}.

data.name: ReqVal_Field_Missing
data.value: The mandatory {0} field was not found in the request.

data.name: ReqVal_Field_Count_Mismatch
data.value: The {0} field was found {1} times, but is allowed only {2} times.

data.name: ReqVal_Field_Not_Allowed
data.value: The {0} field is not allowed.

data.name: ReqVal_Field_Too_Long
data.value: The value "{0}" for the {1} field exceeds the maximum allowed length of {2} characters.

data.name: ReqVal_Field_Not_Defined
data.value: No allowed patterns are defined for the {0} field.

data.name: ReqVal_Err_Regex
data.value: Unable to match pattern "{0}" with value "{1}" for the {2} field.

data.name: ReqVal_No_Match

data.name: ReqVal_Disallow_Match

data.name: DirVal_Rdn_Invalid_Field

data.name: ReqVal_Field_Too_Short
data.value: The value "{0}" for the {1} field deceeds the minimum required length of {2} characters.

data.name: Events_PDEF_REQUEST_DENIED
data.value: Request {0} was denied by the Windows Default policy module.

data.name: ReqVal_Process_Disallowed
data.value: Process "{0}" used to create the certificate request is explicitly disallowed.

data.name: ReqVal_Process_Not_Allowed
data.value: Process "{0}" used to create the certificate request is not on the list of allowed process names.

data.name: ReqVal_Process_Unknown
data.value: Unable to determine the process name that was used to create the certificate request, but policy requires this information. Probably the certificate request does not contain such information.

data.name: ReqVal_Crypto_Provider_Disallowed
data.value: Cryptographic provider "{0}" used to create the certificate request is explicitly disallowed.

data.name: ReqVal_Crypto_Provider_Not_Allowed
data.value: Cryptographic provider "{0}" used to create the certificate request is not on the list of allowed providers.

data.name: ReqVal_Crypto_Provider_Unknown
data.value: Unable to determine the cryptographic provider that was used to create the certificate request, but policy requires this information. Probably the certificate request does not contain such information.

data.name: AttribVal_Insecure_Flags
data.value: The certificate request metadata contains the "san" request attribute, and the certification authority is configured with the EDITF_ATTRIBUTESUBJECTALTNAME2 flag. This is a highly dangerous configuration. The request was therefore denied.

data.name: Events_VALIDITY_REDUCED
data.value: The certificate expiration date of request {0} for {1} was reduced to {2} (UTC) due to policy configuration.

data.name: ReqVal_Err_NotAfter_Invalid
data.value: Unable to parse the configured expiration date specified in certificate request policy.

data.name: ReqVal_Err_NotAfter_Passed
data.value: Certificate request policy requires issued certificates for this certificate template to expire no later than {0} (UTC), which lies in the past.

data.name: ReqVal_Err_Parse_San
data.value: Unable to parse the Subject Alternative Name certificate request extension.

data.name: ReqVal_Forbidden_Extensions
data.value: The certificate request contains a forbidden X.509 extension with object identifier {0} ({1}).

data.name: DirVal_Rdn_Directory_Attribute_too_long

data.name: DirVal_Rdn_Invalid_Directory_Attribute
